short_description: GROWNUPS SURF REAL WAVES & KIDS LEARN HOW TO WINDSURF.
detailed_description:
Our line of SUPs covers inflatable SUPs (iSUP) of superior quality and a advanced and computer-optimised high-accuracy construction that makes our boards stiffer and stronger than other boards on the market. Our "control-flex" construction technology was developed over four years of intense testing and non-stop R&D in close cooperation with our production factory which is highly specialised in high-performance dinghys, rafts and ribs.

In this unique construction we are able to reproduce different bottom shapes on inflatable SUPs with umatched precision. This allows us to give a Vee bottom to some of our boards in the range and a single concave depending on the shape concept.

All inflatable boards come with a wheeled multi compartment bag and a 3-piece paddle that fits into this bag. Switchable 2-way Pump, Fin and Repairkit included.

short_description: FOUR INNOVATIVE CONCEPTS COMBINED IN ONE FOIL BOARD RANGE.
detailed_description:
These brand new foil shapes have been created to feel as neutal and balanced as you've never felt it before.
With the WB-X shapes we have crafted boards that give you flotation and comfort but feel at least one size smaller once you are up and flying on the foil.
After several prototypes and precise testing we are proud and happy to present you the best foil board concept we've seen until today:

  • Computer-aided designs for perfect volume balance and easy starts
  • Low drag bottom for an early and effortless take-off, even with small front wings
  • Concave deck and diamond pad for unmatched grip and carving control
  • Adaptive rocker lines for explosive pop and and amazing riding control
  • Low-drag hull for amazing riding control in gusty winds
  • Adaptive constructions for a perfect strenth-to-weight-to-cost ratio
  • Selected sizes available with additional Tuttle-Box (T)

With a wide range of sizes spread over five different design concepts from prone via freestyle, crossover and race to entry level there’s enough choices to ensure you will find your dream board matching your your riding level and body weight.
Designed by Thomas Goyard and Patrik Diethelm.

short_description: BRANDNEW MIDLENGTH WEAPON FOR WING, PARAWING, PRONE AND E-FOIL USE.
detailed_description:
These new Mid Length foil shapes have been developed to deliver a level of neutrality, balance, and performance that feels unmatched.
With the WB-X Mid Length series, we’ve created boards that provide effortless glide and stable flotation, yet feel more agile and responsive the moment you lift off.

Whether you’re using a wing, soaring with a parawing or carving waves on a foil, these boards are designed for ultimate versatility and control.

short_description: INNOVATIVE LIGHTWEIGHT WING RACING BOARD
detailed_description: The WBR Wingfoil Racing boards are the perfect choice for riders looking to dominate wingfoil races with a lightweight, responsive, and high-performance design. Whether you’re participating in competitive wing racing, long-distance challenges, or pushing the limits of speed, these boards are built to help you win. Get ready to experience peak performance on the water with the WBR range—where every detail has been designed to give you the edge in any race.

short_description: ADVANCED DOWNWIND SHAPE FOR CROSSOVER USE AND FREERIDING
detailed_description:
Developed by Thomas Goyard (Foil specialist, designer and Olympic Windsurfing silver medalist) and mastermind Patrik Diethelm, the DW-X concept has been on Thomas'  mind and heart for a long time. These shape carry his broad experience and knowledge, endless passion and love for downwinding and any foil riding.
After extensive testing and prototyping the range is finally here. These boards have seen it all: flat water, swell, waves, chop and wind speeds from 10 to 40 knots. The goal was to gather as many test results as possible and translate them into the ultimate allround freeride shape. The DW-X range is made for riders who wants to feel one with their board. If you're looking for a reactive, strong and durable board under your feet without breaking the bank - Order your DW-X now!

short_description: A.I.O. = “ALL IN ONE” AND THESE SHAPES LOOK AND WORK LIKE THEY TRAVELLED BACK FROM THE FUTURE.
detailed_description:
A.I.O. = All in One
Exactly this is what PATRIK stands for and we could not be prouder that in Germany they are praised as the “Tesla of wing boards”!
As a shaper and designer Patrik can leave nothing to chance and to ride everything what he designs and feel what is really needed is his strength.

To be able and understand every shape line even on the smallest board size 4’6” with only 35 litres Patrik also showed his persistence on the water and pushed himself to the limits. Those boards can be used for all sorts of foil sports from surfing to tow-in, wake, SUP, Wing and in the two windsurf options also windsurf. An innovative two-step side shape gives the board unique stability and maneuverability. We decided to give you really all the options with our A.I.O. range that is why all the boards have both fin box options the Foil deep turtle and also the US plate system.

BUILD TO LAST:
The full-carbon sandwich PVC construction makes those boards really stiff and consecutively very high performance. On the A.I.O. you feel your foil like you have never felt it before.

The A.I.O. is the perfect foil toy for all dedicated watermen and waterwomen out there!
THE A.I.O. 5'0 is the fastest production wing board out there. You get the exact same board Bastien Escofet was using to break the World Record in 2022.

short_description: OUR MOST RADICAL MULTI-FIN WAVEBOARD EVER!
detailed_description:
The QTS is the result of progession and further devolopment on the QT Wave.
This amazing 5-box waveboards gives you all the options from Quad, to Thruster and Single fin. 
By carefully modifying the bottom contours of the QT with deeper double concaves we have created the most complete and most radical waveboard we've ever designed.
On the wave the new QTS shines with more hold, more drive and especially more grip in the top turn while keeping most of the excellent planing and accelleration of the QT-Wave.
We recommend this board over the TS-Wave in down-the-line conditions and for long fast bottom turns. The QTS has more grip and more drive than the TS.
The TS-Wave wins in onshore conditions and hollow waves that want to be ridden tight in the pocket. The TS has the ability to go super vertical and feels loose and free.

short_description: AROUND-THE-GLOBE PERFORMANCE WAVE BOARD WITH  MULTIPLE FIN OPTIONS. NEW ROCKERLINE AND MORE VEE FOR AN EVEN BETTER WAVE PERFORMANCE.
detailed_description:
Different wave spots, different conditions and different styles of riding make it really difficult to develop a high-level production wave board... but our QT-WAVE is the answer for those who want to travel light and play in any kind of wind and wave conditions.

With the 5 fin boxes (1x US, 4x Slot) you can setup the board as Singlefin, Twinser, Trailer, Tri-Fin, Thruster, Quad and even Trailer Quad (5Fin). With all these options you can perfectly adapt the QT-Wave to your style of riding and the type of waves the spot is offering.

WHAT'S NEW TO THE PREVIOUS MODEL:
- Modified tail rocker for a more agressive feeling on the wave and more control on the turns
- New Vee-shaped tail section for better water release and a more alive rail-to-rail feel
- Optimised strength-to-weight ratio and new graphics by Fabio Canella

short_description: GO VERTICAL ON ANY MEDIUM SIZE AND HOLLOW WAVE.
detailed_description:
Newschool Tri-Fin Concept with three same size S-Wave fins for a true surfing-like feeling on beach break waves. Compact and radical. Extra surface in the nose for new school sliding tricks on the wave. Perfect in small to medium waves and hollow beach breaks that want to be ridden vertically.
More skatey and agile than the QTS but still plenty of grip for carved top turns. More nervous in longer arcs than the QTS. Its agility on unpredictable waves makes this board your perfect onshore and allround travel companion. Loose and super fast with the ability to move very freely on the wave and to change your turn’s radius easily. Good board speed and amazing lift for big jumps. Well balanced and smooth in the chop.

This concept is NOT a free wave board. The TS is a radical surf board that takes your vertical turns to the next level!

short_description: SUPER FAST THRUSTER WAVEBOARD FOR ONSHORE AND BUMP&JUMP
detailed_description:
This special concept in our range is made for the airtime lovers who don’t want to sacrifice the wave riding.
The PATRIK F-Wave is most probably the fastest waveboard ever that still performs well in small to medium waves. With a Powerbox for the center fin of the thruster setup we leave it entirely up to you which fin to choose to go fast and jump high or ride waves and slice turns.
95, 105 and 115 are the sizes we chose for 2025. While the shape of the 95 remained unchanged the two bigger sizes have a new rockerline with increased tail vee. They feel small on the wave, but carry all the volume you need to be the first one planing. If you love to play in any conditions from waves to chop and even flat water the new F-Wave is here for you!

short_description: SUPER FAST ROCKER LINE AND THRUSTER SETUP FOR ONSHORE AND FLATWATER USE.
detailed_description:
This new concept in our range is made for the airtime lovers who don’t want to sacrifice the wave riding. The PATRIK F-Wave is most probably the fastest waveboard ever that still performs well in small to medium waves. With a Powerbox for the center fin of the thruster setup we leave it entirely up to you which fin to choose to go fast and jump high or ride waves and slice turns.
Following the success of the 75, 85 and 95, Patrik Diethelm shaped the 105 and 115 which are new for 2023. These bigger sizes have a new rockerline with increased Vee. They feel small on the wave, but carry all the volume you need to be the first one planing. If you love  to play in different conditions, the new F-Wave is here for you!

short_description: A.I.O. = ALL IN ONE. WINDSURF, WING AND SUP COMBINED IN ONE BOARD.
detailed_description:
A.I.O. stands for “All In One” and those shapes look like if they were forged in another time!
We could not be prouder of the fact that in Germany they are praised as the “Tesla of wing boards”!

Those innovative all-in-one boards are built to last! The full-carbon sandwich PVC construction makes those boards really stiff and consecutively very high performance. On the A.I.O. you feel connected to your foil like you have never felt before.

We decided to give you really all the options with our A.I.O. range that is why all the boards have both fin box options: the Foil Deep Tuttle (DTB) and also the standard Double US plate system. These are the most high-tech windfoil- and wingfoil-hybrids you can find on the market. If you want nothing less than the best ... here's the A.I.O. WS!

short_description: SUPER SHORT AND AGRESSIVE FREESTYLE BOARD FOR FASTEST SPINS AND POWERMOVES.
detailed_description: It's simply amazing to witness what is possible on a windsurfer. The young generation has pushed freestyle to another level. This shape is not just a board with a cut nose but it is a real developed short board and the differences are significant. No matter if in the air or on the water the rotation speed is simply faster and it is the key point to pull multiple moves.

short_description: THE SHORTEST AND MOST RADICAL FREESTYLE BOARD EVER
detailed_description:
A revolutionary shape concept that combines an extremely short and fast rocker line with a modern outline to create our most radical freestyle board ever.
More planing power, more speed, more pop. This board truely does everything better than the previous Airstyle generation.
The new 85 is the latest addition to the family for lighter riders and strong winds while the 92 is our PWA contest machine.
The 99 offers you early planing and amazing sliding and rotation abilities.

short_description: FOIL-ONLY FREESTYLE BOARD. SHORT. LIGHT. RADICAL. NEWSCHOOL.
detailed_description: When you want to learn the real freestyle moves on the foil this will be the right board for you. An ultra compact shape with the right balance is what you need to bust out big moves on the foil. Special adapted stance and masttrack position. Refined aerodynamics. Perfect weight-to-strength ratio.

short_description: THE MOST VERSATILE SHAPE IN OUR RANGE. WAVE-SLALOM AT ITS BEST. 3 FOIL-READY SIZES.
detailed_description:
Simply call it as you wish. Call it “Freemove”, “Freestyle-Wave”, “Bump & Jump” or whatever, important to know is that this is the most versatile shape in our range.
To cruise along, carve some old-school manoeuvres, ride some waves, pop some new-school freestyle tricks, match-race your mate.... all this the F-Cross can do perfectly well and all you need to choose is your footstrap and fin setup.

FOIL-READY AS 124, 136 and 147:
The short and compact shape of the F-Cross works very well as a freeride foil board in the brand-new big sizes 124, 136 and 147. They are wide enough for a good foot offset (more control) and short enough for good aerodynamics in freeride foiling conditions.

Welcome to our most fun shape ever!

short_description: PURE FREEMOVE FOIL BOARD. CRUISING, JIBING, JUMPING. FREE TO MOVE THE WAY YOU LIKE.
detailed_description: The FoilMove is a more advanced shape for windsurfers who want a foilboard in between a FoilStyle and a FoilRide. The narrow shape is harder to control but at the same time easier to jump and of course more aerodynamically stable in strong winds. Cutouts allow for active pumping and earliest flight even on wave and freeride foil sails. Enjoy the FoilMove with smaller sails in any windspeed from 10 to 30 knots and any conditions from flatwater to waves. If it's speedruns, foiltacks, flying 360s, jumps, foilloops... the FoilMove is your new weapon of choice. It works best with light wave or freemove sails like our 5Wave and X-Cross or our pure foil freeride sail RideFoil. Chose a narrow foil that suits the tailwidth well like our 1100 or 900 A.I.O. frontwings.

short_description: THE EASIEST BOARD TO RIDE. AND IT'S FAST TOO. A CLASSIC SHAPE YOU WILL SIMPLY LOVE.
detailed_description:
This board is the remedy for everyone frustrated by wide-body boards that simply don't work for everyone. The F-Ride might be the longest freeride board on the market. Wide-body boards surely have their benefits but from our understanding the intermediate freerider does not benefit too much from the extra width so why should we make the same mistake? So here comes our F-Ride. The extra length on the flat area under the straps makes the board more stable and more foregiving. Additionally the passive planing (no pumping) improves significantly. The narrower width makes it easier to step into the straps and have both legs balanced in a comfortable sailing position.

Don't mistake the extra length with being slow or lame. The F-Ride actually is planing early, accelleration well and carries a massive speed potential while being super forgiving at the same time. The big success of this board has proven us right. Loved by hundreds of windsurfers around the globe this board will take your freeriding to the next level!

short_description: FOIL FREERIDE BOARD FOR EASY AND FAST FOIL CRUISING PLUS FIN ACTION.
detailed_description:
SHAPE AND FEEL
The FoilRide is the easiest to ride out of our five (!) pure foil boards, the FoilCompV2, the FoilRace, the FoilRide, the FoilMove and the FoilStyle.
It's a little narrower in the tail than the FoilRace and the FoilComp. The FoilRide doesn't have cutouts which makes the accelleration more even, easier to control and more stable. Usually freeriders don't use a lot of rake on the foil mast so the additional sinking of the tail as a scondary result of the cutouts is not needed to give the foil a positive angle of attack. It's way more important to give the rider the confidence and safety to gain trust in foiling quickly and improve from session to session.
Of course our cutouts design offer the more agressive accelleration and get to the flight earlier but at the same time the passive accelleration (without pumping sail and board) is really impressive on the FoilRide. The mastrack doesn't come with the deck recess, which is not needed in freeriding, so the board is less vulnerable to deck damage while you're learning to master the foil. The strap placement is more inboard to help foil beginners to get into the straps with ease. We recommend the outboard strap positions for the frontfoot and the inboard positions for your back foot when foiling. The advanced aerodynamics of this board will give you the smoothest and easiest ride on a windfoil you can possibly imagine. 

HOW TO PICK YOUR SIZE?
The wider the board the earlier the flight and the easier the jibes. The narrower the board the better the aerodynamics in strong winds resulting in a more controlled flight and higher top speeds.

FOIL AND FIN READY!
Equipped with a big freeride fin the FoilRide can be used as a fun fin freeride board as well. The short outline feels fun and controlled. The flat rockerline allows for easy planing. The lift of a bigger fin is needed to make the FoilRide come alive. Then it's cutting through the chop like butter and feels always easy to ride, smooth and easy. On the fin the Foilride is surely not our fastest board but maybe the most fun. Especially considering the fact that you can switch from the 95 fuselage foil setup straight to the fin without changing anything else. The wind picks up and foiling gets a little hectic? No problem, just take the foil out, put a 40 fin for the 114, a 44 fin for the 131 and a 48 fin for the 147 and enjoy the ride!! (Make sure to use the outboard and rear strap positions for fin use)

short_description: A THUNDERING FREERACE DESIGN DEVELOPED WITH FREERACERS FOR FREERACERS.
detailed_description:
Most brands simply re-use old slalom models and reduce the size of the cutouts and set the straps more inboard and introduce this as the latest freerace design. Our development was done together with purely dedicated free-racers and some pro-riders who were amazed by the performance in powered conditions against pure competition slalom boards. The slightly longer flat under the straps is the key feature for this shape and makes the board plane earlier and ride more stable and safer in rough conditions. With the smaller cutouts it's less loose and easier to control. Wanna go super fast without killing yourself on a competition slalom board? - The PATRIK F-Race is the perfect board for you!

WHAT'S NEW TO THE PREVIOUS MODEL:
- Modified computer-optimised cutout contours for reduced drag, better waterflow, more accelleration and more topspeed.
- Optimised strength-to-weight ratio and new graphics by Fabio Canella

short_description: PURE FOIL BOARD WITH A WIDE RANGE OF USE FROM FREERIDE TO FOIL RACE.
detailed_description:
The FoilRace is the easier little sister of our pure foil competition machine FoilCompV2. It is able to match the FoilComp's race performance by 98% but is a little more rider friendly than its competition equivalent.
As said before the outline and concept is very close and similar to the FoilCompV2 but less extreme in the details. The cutouts are designed to favour passive accelleration a little better than on the FoilCompV2. They still allow for active pumping and sinking of the tail with raked foils. If you are looking for one foil board to cover any flatwater conditions from freeride to racing this board is for you.

short_description: COMPETITION SLALOM SHAPE WITH RAW ACCELLERATION, SPEED AND CONTROL.
detailed_description:
The PATRIK Slalom gives you the raw accelleration, the control in the chop and in the jibes plus the massive top speed you need to win on the race course or just spritz all your friends at your local spot. If you need ultimate performance - this board is for you.

WHAT'S NEW TO THE PREVIOUS MODEL:
- Modified computer-optimised cutout contours for reduced drag, better waterflow, more accelleration and more topspeed.
- New lowered masttrack: A lowered sail position results in a lowered general center of gravity which significantly improves highend control.
- Optimised strength-to-weight ratio and new graphics by Fabio Canella

short_description: SUPERLIGHT, STIFF AND HOLLOW WITH CONTROLLED FLEX AND UNMATCHED STRENGTH.
detailed_description:
Mastermind Patrik Diethelm himself has put blood, sweat and tears into the development of this revolutionary windsurf construction. What we have achieved is way more than the lightest board construction ever in windsurfing. We found the lightest and strongest construction with a controlled flex pattern. The feeling of an AirInside board is unmatched: The absolute earliest planing possible, brutal accelleration and the best control in the chop. This construction has the smallest production tolerances on the market offering you the most precise reproduction of our master boards possible. 

These boards will last you longer than any other windsurf board. These boards are lighter than any other windsurfboard. These boards are stronger than any other windsurfboard. These boards are proudly made in Ukraine and they will change your windsurfing forever. If you want the best slalom board construction possible look no further. Get your AirInside now!

short_description: OUR FASTEST FOIL SHAPE EVER - WORLDCUP APPROVED
detailed_description:
Short and extreme with the main design goal of reducing aerodynamic drag and give the most stable and controlled flight possible.
Pronounced side bevel bottom with Hyper Release steps. The times you needed to worry about high speed touch downs are over!
Wether it's PWA, DEFI or high level National Foil Racing... This board will take you to the next level.
Ride the exact same foil board as our Worldcup Team!!

short_description: SUPER FAST FOIL RACING MACHINE WITH MASSIVELY INCREASED WIND RANGE.
detailed_description:
The Gen3 version of the PATRIK Foil Comp has the biggest wind range our foil boards have ever had.
The improved aerodynamics of the nose section give you more high-end control and more top speed than ever. Our proven cutout design makes high speed touch downs a walk in the park. Light and stiff with even more trim options to adjust the board to your style of riding. Deck recess for lowered center of gravity. 
Discover the all new Foil Comp Gen 3 and prepare to be blown away by its wide range of use. 

All sizes have been carefully adapted for maximum performance in different conditions and and to suit the style of different riders.

  73 - Pure high-wind DEFI style foiling machine
  79 - Wide windrange for lighter slalom riders
  85 - The PWA weapon for foil slalom
  89 - Slalom and highwind course racing
100 - Pro Course Racing and lightwind foiling

In the weight range of 85-95kgs Michele Becker, Noah Vinther and Alex Cousin choose the Foil Comp 85 for PWA slalom racing, while Marion Mortefon will be using the 79 in PWA foil slalom. In DEFI speed conditions Nico Warembourg trusts in the 73 and Thomas Goyard picks the 79 for high-wind speed sailing.
The 89 is the first choice for light wind racing, all national competition from 8-20 knots, One-Hour formats and any kind of light fun racing with your friends.
In pure course racing competitions nothing can beat the early take-off and extreme upwind performance of the 100.

short_description: FOIL RACING SHAPE. OPTIMISED WEIGHT-TO-STRENGH RATIO AND PERFECT AERODYNAMICS.
detailed_description: The FoilCompV2 is the ultimate foil racing machine. We do believe this is the lightest and strongest foil racing board on the market thanks to the innovative construction solutions invented by our mastermind Patrik Diethelm. As the FoilComp boards are built in our own factory we have a much better option for precision and quality control. It's only up to you now to take it onto the race course!

short_description: OFFICIALLY CLASS REGISTERED BOARD FOR FORMULA FIN AND FOIL COURSE RACING.
detailed_description:
Until today Patrik Diethelm is the only shaper, who has supported this unique discipline for many, many years. This substantial period of continued development has allowed PATRIK to create a race winning formula board. Whilst the revolutionary invert-V feature had once changed the way these board work, it has also opened up new doors to experiment with new shapes, which all equated to a noticeable leap forward in performance year by year. We're sure you’ll enjoy riding the PATRIK Formula 200 to the max!”

Designed for fin and foil course racing. A race-winning concept taken to the next level!

short_description: DEFI FRC - THE FASTEST FREERACE BOARD YOU'VE EVER SEEN.
detailed_description:
SPEED-SLALOM IS BACK!

DEFI FRC 59
This board is an adaption of the pure competition shape DEFI LTD to give you an easier ride on the limit and in the big gusts. An extended center line flat is adding great control and stability without comprising the top speed to much. The outline got extended in the center so tail and nose curve remain unchanged like the DEFI LTD. Patrik Diethelm decided for sightly deeper concaves to make your high-speed runs a little smoother in the chop. Tail rocker tail vee are exactly the same as on the LTD. Footstraps got moved a touch inboard forward and the mast track is positioned more forward than on the LTD for easier access and a less extreme ride. 

DEFI FRC 64
Same shape concept as the small size. Less Vee than the smaller version for a higher ride in lighter winds and earlier planing. Bottom Contours from front to rear: Vee into double concave with side flats into slight vee at the front footstrap into a rockered tail with a more pronounced vee to keep the board nose up in the chop. Fast and easy with massive crosswind speed potential.

short_description: MAXIMUM TOPSPEED FOR HIGHWIND LONGDISTANCE RACING.
detailed_description:
Based on the personal prototypes of multiple DEFI winner Nicolas Warembourg our shaper Patrik Diethelm has created the ultimate long-distance and GPS speed board for all DEFI and speed fans out there! The new DEFI LTD is fast and forgiving with loads of control and a massive topspeed.

- Maximum control in nuclear conditions
- ⁠Easy and less physical to ride to make you competitive in long-distance races
- Next-level crosswind topspeed and never seen upwind speed performance
- Broad wind range with massive speed potential thoughout the whole windrange
- More average speed and top speed oriented than your standard slalom board
- Wider range of use than your speed board

short_description: THE MOST REWARDED AND MOST RECORD WINNING WINDSURFING SPEED RANGE ON THE MARKET.
detailed_description:
In the past couple of years Speed Windsurfing had a big impact on windsurfing history. With the Luderitz canal in Namibia, the overall speed times went up by about 5 knots. In one of the record attempts, Patrik Diethelm scored the best result of the event with a time of 51.18 Knots.

Even though he didn’t break the world record himself his most eye-opening result were his 48.77 knots in marginal wind speed around 25 knots on an over 6 sqm. sail. Patrik Diethelm: “Just for fun I borrowed another rider's 6.3 and could barely start in the light winds. I was happy making it dowwind around the first corner. The run felt slow and almost boring and I was happy to reach the finish without stopping. So far my feelings during the run. After getting the official timing of 48.77 knts I could not believe it. Since then I have bright ideas on how to design faster speed equipment."

The 2022 WOMEN WORLD RECORD by Heidi Ulrich has proven once again how damn fast our boards and sails are.

Today we are happy to be supporting the Prince of Speed organized by Andrea Baldini – Principe that is organizing amazing speed events in the South of France. So if you go really fast sign in to one of his events and break your personal records. If you also want to have a historical moment in your windsurf memory - don’t wait and get one of our PATRIK speed boards which are known to be the most controlled and fastest of all. 

Pictures @Pete Davis Photography

short_description: AIRSIDE: USE A SMALL SPEED BOARD EARLIER THAN YOU EVER THOUGHT YOU COULD.
detailed_description: The Speed40 AirInside is the lightest speed board ever made. The incredible AI Technology allows us to control flex and stiffness and create a speedboard that starts and accellerates like a medium speed board but got the top speed and control of an absolute speed weapon. Use this board for deep downwind runs on the channel or in more crosswind flatwater conditions. The high strength and impact resistance makes this board last longer than your normal board. Enjoy AirInside!

short_description: SPECIALLY ADAPTED KIDS BOARD FOR ADVANCED MINI RIPPERS. FIRST PLANING TO FREESTYLE.
detailed_description:
The Micro-X is not a small adult board. It's a carefully adapted pure kids and youth board. With redesigned everything from rails to stance and mast track position to give advanced kids the perfect board to enjoy every session on the water. This board is accellerating fast and early planing is a key feature. While riding it feels fast but forgiving at the same time. The Micro-X ist perfect to learn powerjibes, first jumps and even advanced freestyle tricks.
You want your kids to progress fast and enjoy windsurfing to the max? Try the Micro-Ride!

For beginner kids we recommend its bigger sister, the Micro-Ride 115.

short_description: OUR MOST RADICAL KiDS FREESTYLE BOARD
detailed_description:
Advanced Kids Freestyle and Freeride Board.
Based on the Airstyle 85 Gen2 this board has been carefully modified do suit the needs of tomorrow's windsurfing generation.
The rails, stance and mast track position have been adapted and the weight has been reduced.
The colourful design matches our 3-Micro sails.
The Micro-X Gen2 is the shortest kids board on the market. It offers you early planing, amazing acceleration and control plus lots of pop for jumps and freestyle move.
For beginner kids we recommend its bigger sister, the Micro-Ride 115.

204.0 cm x 60.0 cm x 85 l

short_description: KIDS BOARD WITH A SPECIAL VOLUME DISTRIBUTION THAT ALLOWS FOR EARLY PLANING.
detailed_description: When you wish your kid to fell in love with windsurfing this board is for you. The Micro Ride is a fully EVA padded board dedicated to kids. With its 34 cm center power box fin that works like a daggerboard, any kid can learn the absolute basics. The board is small enough that even a 4-year-old kid does not have problems turning it around. When your kid progresses, you can mount the foot straps in various positions to comfortably learn to use the straps. Once he is ready to go planning the central fin is removed and he becomes the real micro rider = windsurfer!

short_description: THE ONE AND ONLY SMART-LEARNING WINDSURF BEGINNER BOARD ON THE MARKET. COLOUR-GUIDED WINDSURFING AND WINGING FOR EVERYONE.
detailed_description:
An easy-learning maneuverable beginner board for all surf schools and for you and your family and kids too. 
Our unique colour-guided learning method will help you to teach and learn windsurfing in no time. Predefinded foot positions will help the beginner and intermediate to find the correct stance and balance quickly. The board also indicates the right of way rules on the water where the starboard tack got priority.
This board is praised by many surf schools world-wide. The E-Ride is the smart-learning windsurf board you will come to love from day one.

Our beginner board does also work extremly well for Wing-Surfing lessons as it reacts quickly to the lightest steering commands!
The E-Ride feels smaller than traditional school boards. Choose the 205 for an 85kg+ person, elderly people or people with physical or mental disabilities. Kids should always learn on the 165 or switch to the Micro-Ride 115 as early as possible.
The E-Ride 155 is your transitional board between a pure beginner and a more sporty but very foregiving intermediate board. The optional Centerfin will asssist you to point upwind and drift less in light winds. With the straps set all the way back and without the centerfin in the middle of the board the E-Ride 155 will convert into an entry level funboard with excellent passive accelleration and solid topspeed.

short_description: PURE WAVE SAIL FOR KIDS AND ANY LIGHT RIDERS WHO WANT A PERFORMANCE FUN SAIL.
detailed_description: This 3-batten sail is the short to having fun on the water. Based on our performance wave sails we created a sail that feels light like a feather, creates controlled drive with little backhand pressure and will twist and flex like a proper sail. Over are the days where beginners, women, kids and teenagers needed to fight with flappy and heavy sails! Here comes the revolution. Easy planing, the lightest handling for waterstarts and jibes, enough drive to allow you to use the smallest size possible and on top a wide, wide windrange. Combined with our ultra-light Micro Mast and our Micro Boom this sail is the perfect setup for the future generation of windsurfing!

short_description: ALL-NEW HOT EVOLUTION OF OUR 4-BATTEN WAVE SAIL.
detailed_description:
This sail has been developed and tested extensively in a wide range of conditions from Australia to Denmark and Gran Canaria as we wanted to give you that one perfect wave sail that does it all. We have added many new innovative features and are proud to deliver the most radical and most complete wave sail we’ve ever designed.
Reduced overall weight, same strength: The LTD won't let you down when other sails break. Travel light and make the 4Wave LTD your first choice for any wave, any day, anywhere!

What people love about the original 4Wave is still here: The power, the drive, the durability.
What some were missing we've managed to add: The lightness, the agility and the magic.
Get your 4Wave LTD now!!

short_description: HEAVY-DUTY ALL-CONDITIONS POWER WAVE SAIL WITH A PERFECT ON-OFF BALANCE AND LOTS OF DRIVE.
detailed_description:
Developed in Margaret River, Australia, by our congenial design duo Patrik Diethelm and Fabio Canella, this sail has met our riders highest expectations right from the start.

The 4Wave offers a fairly unique concept of innovative backhand-powercontrol. By defining the profile of the sail with a special mix of materials - from a soft dacron in the front to the stiffest x-ply in the back of the sail - we could reduce the twist of the sail body above the boom in a positive way that offers you that little bit of extra horsepower – constantly available whenever you need it. Key to the 4Wave's outstanding efficiency is the wide outline in the centre of the sail while keeping a standard boom length. The panel above the boom gets the cleanest airflow so the wide panel can create drive and power while the narrow top guarantees for easy clew-first behaviour. This sail's mighty low-end acceleration can easily outperform bigger sails, so for the full experience make sure to ride your 4Wave smaller than you usually would: With on pull of the backhand you can always unleash the power while you benefit from faster rotations, more radical turns and last but not least a better wipeout-resistance of a smaller sail in big surf.

short_description: 5-BATTEN WAVE SAIL WITH MAXIMUM HIGH-END CONTROL AND A PLAYFUL FEEL ON THE WAVE.
detailed_description: The PATRIK 5Wave is our most playful, super-efficient, 5-batten classic wavesail. Developed in Margaret River, Australia, by Patrik Diethelm and 3D mastermind Fabio Canella, this sail is the first choice for crossover freestyle/wave and maximum control in big waves and strong winds. Key to the 5Wave's outstanding control and efficiency is the high aspect ratio design. The refined outline taken from our 4Wave power wave sail allows for maximum control at high speeds and an easier release in top turns and big landings. By giving slightly more luffcurve than other modern wavesails, we managed to increase the tension on the sail body for maximum control and a locked sail pressure point while reducing the swinging of the mast in choppy conditions at the same time.

short_description: PURE PRO FREESTYLE SAIL WITH EXTRA STRENGTH AND WAVE DNA.
detailed_description:
A revolutionary freestyle sail concept with incredible acceleration, broad wind range and perfect ducking behaviour.
While sizes 3.6, 4.0, 4.4 and 4.8 are based on Nil's demand for no-compromise competition sails, the 5.2LW is a carefully modified low-wind sail with extra boom length, extra profile depth and extra horsepower to get you planing and spinning as early as possible in light wind while avoiding big and uncomfortable sail sizes. If you want performance freestyle sails plus the most powerful and light 5.2 you've ever seen... look no further and order your 4STYLE set now!

short_description: HEAVY-DUTY BUMP AND JUMP IN FLATWATER AND WAVES!
detailed_description:
The X-Cross XPLY most probably is the most versatile sail on the market. From freeride blasting in flatwater to busting airs in the waves of Australia, this sail can do it all. A 5-batten concept based on our successful 5Wave wave sail incorporates the newest ideas and tweaks of Patrik Diethelm and Fabio Canelle to become everybodies darling. The small sizes are more manouver-orientated while the bigger sizes are designed to be perfect flatwater and bump-and-jump joy machines.
The new XPLY window for 2025 makes it even better!

short_description: BUMP AND JUMP WITH MAXIMUM RANGE OF USE FROM FLATWATER TO WAVES!
detailed_description: The X-Cross most probably is the most versatile sail on the market. From freeride blasting in flatwater to busting airs in the waves of Australia, this sail can do it all. A 5-batten concept based on our successful 5Wave wave sail incorporates the newest ideas and tweaks of Patrik Diethelm and Fabio Canelle to become everybodies darling. The small sizes are more manouver-orientated while the bigger sizes are designed to be perfect flatwater and bump-and-jump joy machines.

short_description: EASY, FUN AND FAST FREERIDE SAIL!
DEDICATED FREERIDE FOIL SAIL FOR CONTROLLED FLIGHT AND EASY PROGRESS.
detailed_description: Light and stable in your hands for are smooth and controlled ride on any foil board. Based on the concepts of our race winning slalom foil sails we've managed to transfer the locked, low-backhand-pressure design onto the Ride Foil. The high aspect profile gives you improved aerodynamics for early takeoff and good top speed. The short boom and carefully designed twist characterics make your flight controlled, easy and stable without sudden load changes. This might well be the most user-friendly and powerful freeride foil sail out there. We're absolutely stoked about the outcome of this sail!

short_description: 3-CAM FREERACE SAIL COMBINING SLALOM PERFORMANCE AND FREERIDE HANDLING.
detailed_description:
The GT3-FRC is the little sister of our competition slalom sail RaceSF. Based on the concept and panels of this contest winning fin and foil hybrid race sail the GT3-FRC performs equally well on fin AND foil. Many updates and modifications make this sail light and easy in your hands. At the same the GT3 doesn't lose its racing DNA. Fabio Canella and Patrik Diethelm gave it a more narrow mastsleeve while mainly keeping the original panels of the RaceSF. The softer mastsleeve material makes the sail more alive and a little more forgiving. Clearly designed to work absolutely best on RDM masts there will be a SDM camber set available for purchase to modify the GT3 to SDM use. With the RDM standard configuration the sail feels lighter, faster and has a much better handling in the jibes. With SDM you gain a touch of extra low-end while losing some of the playful lightness. 

Ride the TEST-WINNER!
With impressive total of 57.5 out of 60 points the GT3-FRC has been a clear winner in the French Planchemag 2/3 cam freerace sail test May '23.
The GT3-FRCV got maximum points for topspeed-control, maneuvre handling, camber-rotation and ease of use on fin and at the same time winning the best performace on foil!

short_description: 3-CAM FREERACE HIGH ASPECT SAIL ON RDM OR SDM FOR MAXIMUM CONTROL ON FOIL AND FIN.
detailed_description: Directly based on our competition foil sails the GT3-Foil combines the lightness and smooth handling of a RDM sail with the locked feeling and speed of our pure racing sails. You will be amazed how light this 3-cam sail feels during the jibes or while starting. Its true racing DNA allows for a controlled and stable flight on the foil and the perfect aerodynamics of this high aspect design help to get planing and flying early. The softer and smaller mast sleeves makes the sail more forgiving and easier to waterstart as the sleeve takes less water when the sail gets dropped into the water. Camber rotation is soft and direct. On the fin this sail shines with exceptional control and balance for the advanced freerace rider while feeling light on the backhand no matter how hard the gusts are hitting. Conclusion: The GT3 is a super balanced sail with a broad range of use from foil slalom to fin freeracing.

short_description: SUPER FAST SLALOM AND SPEED SAIL WITH ALL IMPROVED CHARACTERISTICS.
detailed_description: We have takent the world title and world record winning Race+ to the next level. It first seemed like mission impossible to improve this speed and slalom sail that our teamriders love so much. After carefully finetuning many aspects of the sail we're absolutely thrilled to bring you the new RACE LA for the 2024 season. "LA" stand for "low aspect" ratio. This sail is a pure fin sail and a mighty power horse. It will drive you down the slalom course like nothing else and is the weapon of choice for speedsailing and GPS speed events. The deeper profile and longer boom straight keep you powered up at all times while the new release characteristics have improved the high wind control even more compared to the Race+ which has gained its repuzation on speed strips all over the world. I you're looking for a no-compromise ultra fast fin racing sail, reach for the new RACE LA.

short_description: HIGH-PERFORMANCE HYBRID RACING SAIL FOR FIN AND FOIL.
detailed_description: Closely based on the successfull RACE SF fin and foil slalom sail, the new RACE MA takes your riding to the next level. "MA" stands for "medium aspect" and describes the carefully tuned medium aspect ratio of the sail which gives you the most balanced performance on foil and fin you can ever imagine. THE MA IS clearly more powerful than the RACE HA and drives you through the jibes when being used on the fin. It has enough grunt and power to accelerate you to the front at the starting line. At the same time the optimised release and breathing gives you a sail that's relatively light on the backhand and will perform amazingly well on the foil.

short_description: ALL IMPROVED PURE FOIL RACING SAIL FOR SLALOM AND COURSE RACING.
detailed_description:
The most balanced foil sail you've ever had - WINNER OF THE 2024 PWA CONSTRUCTOR'S WOLRD TITLE!!!

"HA" stands for "high aspect" and this advanced high aspect design has been the key to more efficiency, more control, more top speed and more overall performance. The all redesigned lower foot balances the sail out for prefect flight stability. Backhand-pressure has been carefully reduced further to give you a more neutral sail in the gusts while the low-end of the sail improved compared to the Foil S2. As the sail sizes get smaller we shiftet the design goal carefully from pure course racing in the big sizes to slalom and speed-slalom and long-distance in the smallest sizes. One set of foil sails that does it all for you! 

If you want the most advanced foil racing sail out there then look no further and try the new RACE HA for Foil Course Racing, Foil Slalom and Foil Speed.
Ride the excact same foil sail as Justine Lemeteyer, Johan "The Beast" Soe, Michele Becker and all our international riders.

short_description: MAXIMUM ACCELERATION, SOFT CAMBER ROTATION AND HIGHEND CONTROL FOR FIN SLALOM AND SPEED.
detailed_description: To chase top results in slalom racing and 500m speed runs you need a maximum horse power and most importantly... control! No matter where and when you cross the starting line - this sail has the power and stability to drive you to the finish with the best average speeds you've ever experienced. Even in the strongest gusts this sail holds the board's nose down so you can unleash the beast and accellerate until you get goosebumps. This is the original speed world record sail used by Heidi Ulrich which she prefers fpr deep downwind runs, while she and many riders would use the RaceSF in more crosswind conditions.

short_description: HIGH-ASPECT CONCEPT FOR MAXIMUM PERFORMANCE WITH FOIL AND FIN!
detailed_description:
The RacsSF (SF = Slalom/Foil) is a very modern take on a hybrid competition sail. Many rides asked for the flexibility to switch from Foil to Fin without changing the sail. So we listened carefully and here comes the most advanced hybrid sail you can possibly find. Originally developed by Patrik Diethelm and Fabio Canella to work on both foil and fin equally well the RaceSF more and more became everybody's favourite for highwind fin slalom and crosswind speed as soon as it gets super windy. This high aspect design is less physical for the rider and with the shorter boom got a better handling in the jibes. Our pure fin slalom sail the Race+ got an advantage in upwind and downwind angles though.
On the foil the RaceSF allows for a controlled flight. With its advanced aerodynamic the sail got a massive topspeed while feeling more alive and loading a bit more than our pure foil sail FoilS2. This can be an advantage for the heavy rider, the more recreational rider and for the use in lighter winds, where a bit more backhand pressure makes pumping and accelleration easier.

short_description: COMPETITION SLALOM/SPEED FOIL SAIL OPTIMISED FOR FLYING ON THE LIMIT WITH MAX AVERAGE SPEEDS.
detailed_description:
Control, control, control. The FoilS2 is a pure slalom and speed foil sail for the competition rider who is searching for the fastet and most technically advanced foil sail out there. The high aspect ratio design allows for perfect aerodynamics. We have optimised the sail for maximum average speed. The more controlled and equal the speed of your flight is the easier you can move closer to the edge of what's possible in modern foil racing.
The newly developed sizes 4.2 and 3.6 are designed as 6 batten sails with 3 cams as we found this combination to provide the best mix of stiffness, controlled flex and reduced sail weight in nuclear foiling conditions.

You want the perfect foiling machine?! Here comes the PATRIK FoilS2.

short_description: FOIL SAIL WITH EARLIEST FLIGHT AND INSANE UPWIND ANGLES
detailed_description: Up- and Downwind are the preferred racing angles of this specific foin sail design. With this very stable and easy controllable sail your concentration can stay fully focused on the tactics. The stronger the wind the more you'll feel like - wow, this sail has a wide range of use! Just keep racing on the same size when others desperately rush back to the beach to rig their smaller sails.

short_description: SUPER NEUTRAL WITH INTERCHANGEABLE HANDLE SYSTEM.
detailed_description:
The new Volant X wing carries our latest innovations in wing design. 
The all new interchangeable handle system offers you a boom and optional hard handles.
One wing for any conditions from wave/freestyle to free-racing. Travel light - Enjoy the ride!
VX Gen4. Designed by Patrik Diethelm and Thomas Goyard.

The CHASE Project

short_description: THIS GEN3 VERSION OF OUR WING BEATS ANYTHING IN TERMS OF HANDLING, CONTROL AND SPEED.
detailed_description:
The Volant Cross Gen3 wing is so much more than just a "new" Volant Cross V2.
We've updated and improved many tech features but mainly we've taken the shape and profiles to the next level.
The new low-drag design with further improved and exclusive "semi-hard handles" and controlled tip flex will take your riding to the next level. 

If you want that one wing that does it all... from racing and cruising to freestyle and waves... look no further!

short_description: SUPER FAST PERFORMANCE WING FROM FREESTYLE TO RACING FOR THE ADVANCED RIDER.
detailed_description:
The Volant Cross V2 is our new Crossover wing dedicated to those who want to push their limits.
This wing proved to be one of the fastest wings out there so enjoy its speed potential for racing or busting out freestyle tricks.
The V2 is well-balanced and stable, it will give loads of lift during tricks and feels light and neutral on the wave due to its excellent aerodynamics.

The Volant Cross V2 surprised many riders and many brands when Bastien Escofet was winning the 2022 DEFI WING on a production wing.
We've thoughtfully chosen the sizes to give you the perfect wing in any wind speeds from 4knts to 45+ knts.

short_description: ONE CROSSOVER WING FOR MAXIMUM FUN! PERFECT FOR BEGINNERS. ADVANCED TWIST FOR A WIDE WINDRANGE.
detailed_description:
An easy wing for everyone and our surfschool partners simlpy love it!
The Volant Cross is very forgiving yet at the same time offers a lot of drive and power to get you going early on the foil. Less tension on the canopy allows the wing to fill with wind early which makes it stable and easy to start for beginners. Two big PVC windows give you good visibility and make winging safer in crowded locations. The wing is designed with an increased twist and flex. It absorbs the gusts smoothly and got an extented windrange compared to stiffer wings. Of course more advanced riders would chose the Volant Cross V2 which got more power, more lift but it also a lot more difficult to ride.
It works perfectly on our A.I.O. Wingboards and for the cautious foil-scared beginner on the E-Ride and Micro-Ride too.
The multiple handles give you carefully chosen predefined grip positions, which we found is very helpful for learners.

short_description: SUPERLIGHT AND STRONG CARBON BOOMS FOR HEAVY WAVE AND FREESTYLE USE.
detailed_description:
Superlight and stiff manouvre- and wave oriented carbon boom handmade as a one-piece monocoque carbon construction.

  • Super-smooth EVA grip to give you the longest sessions without blisters on your hands.
  • 25mm round diametre for a direct but relaxed and less tiring hold.
  • New harness line position indicator system for easy memory and quick adjustments.
  • New-school 39cm S-Curve for the most direct connection to the sail and best handling in your moves.
  • Best power transfer due to the use of high quality carbon fibres and our redesigned backend.
  • Double-Pin Clips for superiour strength and backend stiffness.
  • Printed cm-scale on the backend for convenient adjustment of the boom.
  • Outhaul rope loop feature for quick and easy rigging.
  • Lightweight shockpads to protect the boom backend against wear.
  • Detachable click-in RDM adapter.


If you don't want to compromise on performance and quality the search for your new boom is over with the new PATRIK Carbon S-Curve Boom.

Superlight and stiff racing oriented carbon boom handmade as a one-piece monocoque carbon construction.

Pure performance racing carbon boom handmade as a one-piece monocoque carbon construction.

  • 200 - 250 and 210 - 260cm length, modern 52 and 53cm wide XL-Curve diameter
  • Maximum stiffness for the most power and controll on racing sails

short_description: SUPERLIGHT AND AFFORDABLE. THE PERFECT BOOM FOR SCHOOLS AND KIDS.
detailed_description:
Light, durable and affortable boom made as a one-piece monocoque aluminium construction.

  • Super-smooth EVA grip to give you the longest sessions without blisters on your hands.

short_description: Patrik hydro-foil!
PATRIK CARBON FOIL MASTS
detailed_description:
MODEL MATERIAL WEIGHT* STIFFNESS BOX HEAD
Carbon 85 PVC Carbon (PVC core) 1935 g * * * US PLATE
Carbon 82 Full Carbon 2450 g * * * * DTB
Carbon 95 Full Carbon 2670 g * * * * DTB
Carbon HM 95 High Modulus Carbon  2790 g * * * * * DTB

 

The PVC Carbon 85 mast is the lightest and stiffest alternative to our A.I.O. aluminium masts. With its 1940g it roughly is 500g lighter than the Alu85. This is a significant difference for freestyle use, jumping and reduced swing weight while pumping the foil.

The Carbon 82 mast is recommended for foil freestyle where a shorter mast gives you more control over your foil in rotations or for shallow water use where a 95 mast feels uncomfortable and could cause too much damage to your foil. It weighs 2450g* and is significantly lighter than its longer variants which again favours big jumps, spins and rotations but also helps lighter riders to carry and control their foil gear better. Ssshhht, secret info: Jibing gets easier on a shorter mast, too.

The Carbon 95 is our standard carbon windsurf mast. It offers you superb stiffness and minimal flex and twist patterns and weighs 2670g*. With this mast you have great control over your foil and a smooth and controlled ride with instant power transmission and precise steering in your jibes.

The Carbon HM 95 is on of the stiffest windsurfing foil masts ever built. This 2790g* monster makes the big boys and racers smile. Its secret lay-up of hand-selected premium grade high modulus carbon gives this mast a flex and twist pattern that other brands can only dream of. Reduced flex allows for bigger frontwings and steeper upwind angles while having the best possible control oin critical riding situations. The minimal twist gives you full control over your foil and allows for the most precise steering you have ever experienced on a free race foil. Say goodbye to soft masts that feel like riding a bicycle with flat tyres... Say Hello to a new level of directness and control!

* weights may vary +-5% due to the fully custom handmade production process

child_products.product_name: Patrik Foil Mast Carbon 85 PVC (US PLATE)

short_description: A.I.O. ALUMINIUM FOIL MASTS
detailed_description:
MODEL MATERIAL WEIGHT STIFFNESS ADAPTER / BOX
ALU 65 High-grade Aluminium 2125 g * * * US / PB / TB & Foilbox
ALU 75 High-grade Aluminium 2300 g * * * US / PB / TB & Foilbox
ALU 85 High-grade Aluminium 2480 g * * US / PB / TB & Foilbox

* all weights +-3% tolerance. Indicated weights show masts with fully mounted US plate adapter. 

Chose the ALU 65 for shallow water prone foiling, beginner lessons in windfoiling and wingfoiling and for kids.
The ALU 75 offers a great balance between stiffness and length. Recommended for surf foiling and winging and for heavier riders.
Use the ALU 85 for added control and pop or for windfoiling. Not recommended for 95kgs+ riders, who should look into our carbon mast range instead.

General advise:
With a short mast the turning, pitch and roll of the foil is easier to control. Stalls will happen more often as you have less length to control your flight but touchdowns will be easier and with less force from smaller heights. Jibing and turning will be easier as you need less centrifugal force (less speed) to stay on the board.
A longer masts allows for more speed. At higher speeds in becomes impossible to follow the water surface and adjust your flight height to each bump you are crossing so you need more mast lenghts to compensate. At the same time the liftet center of gravity makes it more difficult to control the foil. Heavy riders will als start to feel a difference in mast stiffness the longer the mast gets.

short_description: Swept with a soft tip for the perfect turn!
detailed_description:
S-wave: wave fin aimed for side shore situations. Its emphasised back-curved outline gives a great precision in defining your trajectory even through the biggest wave. Every size has its own specific tip thickness in order to create the exact flex desired by the top riders for their extreme performances.

Besides, the exclusive designing process is aimed to let the real profile be always parallel to water flow even at tip spot, so that the fin is faster and more efficient at the same time.

The tiniest sizes can be also matched with P-wave central fin/s, for thruster/quad set ups, so that you will gain pure speed but still have a lot of drive on waves.

The biggest sizes will largely satisfy those who still appreciate the “single fin” wave boards speed and surfing style.

short_description: Power with highest performance!
detailed_description:
P-wave: multi pourpose wave fin, which comes as standard for our very adaptable all-around Qt-wave boards. This fin has a trailing edge quite straight and planes and turns creating very narrow turning radius. For this reason, this fin is also perfect for on-shore or gusted wind conditions, to run away quickly from the shore break.

Furthermore, if you like the “slashed” style to create very high sprays, we assure you will really enjoy our P-waves!

The small sizes can be also matched with the P-style fins for thruster configuration on on-shore wave or freestyle-wave boards, in order to have more traction to caress waves surface keeping your board fast. This is, actually, the exact standard configuration you will find on our fast F-wave boards.

short_description: Slide your moves!
detailed_description:
S-style: hardened freestyler, this fin is looking for you! S-style stands for “slide-style”, and this gives you the clue what it has been designed for. It has a quite elliptical outline, calibrated measures that fit exactly what PWA freestyler top riders ask for.

When we designed it, we focused on several elements such as: the lift needed to plane soon even using a so small fin, a calibrated shape to give you the best mix of the slightest resistance during multiple rotations and control, since nobody likes fins reacting sharply when you change foot pressure to prepare your next switch trick.
Last but not least, we kept in mind the updwind performance, really important when you need to stay in a well defined “water space” and be able to show all your moves in a heat of very few minutes.

short_description: Power - early planing - top acceleration and top speed!
detailed_description:
P-race: it is a slalom fin “dressed” with G10 material. We have been very ambitious when designing it, since we wanted to realize a product able to fully compete with blazoned and branded full carbon fins that you can find under PWA slalom athletes’ boards.

After producing several prototypes with different profiles (8), outlines (3), thickness (3) and many tested measures, we achieved to realize a fin that leave us astonished.

If you don’t believe us, you can ask those who have been engaged “head to head” against P-race fins riders and who, only once on the beach, have realized they had raced against a G10 fin.

Therefore, we are sure we can offer an excellent product for those who do not have time to develop any PWA rider technique and trim, but who, at the same time, wish to achieve maximum performances by using a full slalom and freerace equipment.

short_description: THE ONE AND ONLY FREE FALL HOOK
detailed_description:
This self-releasing harness hook will help making your windsurfing a little bit safer.
Everyone knows it, everyone fears it: The foil windsurfing catapult crash.
Once adjusted correctly the Freefall Hook will open under excessive load and release the sailor from the harness lines.

Maintenance:
Avoid contact with fine sand. Rinse with fresh water after sea and salt water use. Don't apply grease as it can trap sand and block the mechanism.
Use small amounts of WD40 if needed and clean off excess oil.

Please remember:
This hook is NOT an official safety device. It's an addition to your existing protection gear.
It can not protect you from injuries but it may soften your crashes and help to make your foiling experience less dangerous.
Always wear your safety gear, helmet and impact vest!
Always sail within your limits.

V2 version of our competition harness lines:

  • Original ClamCleat on the backhand for in-race adjustment
  • New marked front-hand adjustment to set your basic length.
  • Improved stiffer boom connection for less twist and swing.
  • Easier hook-in and quicker release.
  • Switch from Fin to Foil with the same boom
  • PWA racing approved

detailed_description:
Our boardbags are light-padded dayrunner bags with a very resistant and strong nylon skin. The bottom side is made of reflective silver poly fabric to reduce overheating in the sun. These bags perfect for transporting your boards in the car or on roof racks. We don't recommend these boardbags as single protection on air freight. 6mm high density foam on top and bottom plus 4mm at nose and tail keeps your board cool and protects it from dings, scratches and tight roof straps. 

Please note that our bag sizes are compromised to fit as many board types as possible, which allows us the keep the boardbag prices at a reasonable level for you! So don't expect our bags to fit each board tight as a sock. Tight boardbags are problematic anyway as the lack of air circulation may cause dampness problems and osmosis with your board, so leave your board some freedom inside the bag and remember to leave the zippers open when your board is still wet.

SIZING:
The given size refers to the maximum board with and length fitting the boardbag, not the outside measurements of the bag flat on the ground. For most accurate selection please ask your PATRIK shop the check boardbag sizes for you according to our board-boardbag match list.

short_description: HIGH PERFORMANCE FOIL MASTS THAT SET A NEW STANDARD FOR DRAG, FLEX AND TWIST BLOCK
detailed_description:
AEON – The only fully compatible multi sport foil system proving world cup podium places and international titles in four disciplines and both sports of Windsurfing and Winging.

  • Formula Windsurfing Foil World Champion 2023 – Elia Colombo

  • IFCA Slalom Foil European Champion 2023 – Michele Becker

  • Wingfoil Racing & Freestyle European Champion 2023 – Bastien Escofet

Our four carbon masts cover all the needs of customers using the deep tuttle box system. These foil masts beat everything currently available on the market in terms of drag, flex stiffness and twist block. The technical advantages result in better control over your foil, a more relaxed ride in choppy conditions, easier jibing, more topspeed and less breakage. Experience a whole new level of control. Get your AEON foil now!

(More mast options and sizes with US-Track system in carbon and aluminium constructions to come in 2024.)



DIRECT ACCESS: WINDFOIL SETS // MASTS // FUSELAGES // FRONTWINGS // BACKWINGS // ACCESSORIES

short_description: WORLDCUP PERFORMANCE LOW-DRAG FOIL FRONT WINGS FOR YOUR AEON FOIL SYSTEM
detailed_description:
Our front wings have the best thickness-to-strength ratio on the market resulting in ultra-stiff wings with controlled flex patterns. Our production process has been optimised to have the lowest tolerances in the windsurfing industry.

  • “DNA-M” for “Medium” stiffness. More power for heavy riders and lighter winds. Affordable pricing.

  • “DNA-H” for stiffness level “Hard”. Maximum control in high winds, high speed runs and jibes.

  • "DNA-X" is a special "H" construction (named "H" on the actual wing) when profiles get too thin for "DNA-M" layups.

short_description: THE AEON FUSELAGES WITH THE PATENTED SELF-LOCKING CONNECTION.
detailed_description:
“Aluminium” beats carbon in terms of compatibility, stiffness and lightweight 3-Dimensional strength.

“Titanium” beats aluminium and carbon offering even more stiffness and allowing reduced diameter outlines with less drag and improved 3-dimensional strength.

Mast-Fuselage connection: The patent pending “Self-Lock Dual-Box” guarantees the safest and stiffest connection backed up with 2x tx30 M6 extra safety bolts.

Frontwing connection: The flat surface with a recess in the centre and 3x tx30 M8-Bolts is offering the stiffest and most reliable front wing connection available.

Backwing connection: The flat surface with a centre recess and multiple m6 inserts guarantees precise backwing trim options with a stiff and reliable connection.

short_description: THE TECHNICALLY MOST ADVANCED STABILIZER REAR WINGS ON THE MARKET
detailed_description:
“DNA-H” (hard) only for the most stability and control in all conditions. The special profile and shape of the backwings allow us to use low angles of attack on the stabilizers without losing control and flight stability. The whole foil system is working as one. Our backwings are carefully finetuned to work best with our fuselage shapes and frontwings.

  • 150: Surface 150cm2, Span 340mm, Aspect Ratio 7.70 
  • 160: Surface 160cm2, Span 380mm, Aspect Ratio 9.03
  • 175: Surface 175cm2, Span t.b.c., Aspect Ratio t.b.c.
  • 195: Surface 195cm2, Span 420mm, Aspect Ratio 9.05


    (Bigger sizes for Windsurf and Wingfoil Wave / Freestyle and Freeride to come 2025.)

short_description: SHIMS, BAGS, TOOLS AND EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO COMPLETE YOUR AEON FOIL SYSTEM
detailed_description:
Make sure to order your accessories when you are composing your individual AEON set from single parts. Shimset, bag and screwdriver need to be ordered seperately but will be included in the complete foil sets. Protection covers are included with the masts, frontwings and backwings. All AEON screws (m6 and m8) use the TX30 head. Tuttle box screw length will vary according to the board you are using and for that reason are not included with AEON the foil. Always make sure your tuttle box screws are long enough and fully use the thread lengths of the inserts.

short_description: THE OFFICIAL iQ BOOM

Diametre: 30mm
Construction: 100% PrePreg Carbon
Weight: 3520g (+-5% production tolerances)

(The PATRIK iQ boom is being produced and made in the official iQ factories and is technically identical to the Severne 210-250 iQ boom.)

short_description: NO-COMPROMISE DOWNWIND RACING BOARD
detailed_description:
The DW-R are engineered for pure glide, early lift, and uncompromising efficiency, offering the ideal platform for downwind foilers seeking maximum performance over long ocean runs or flat-water racing.

Designed to meet the unique demands of DW racing foiling, these boards give experienced riders everything they need to link bumps effortlessly and maintain speed with minimal leg & paddle power. With a focus on ultra-light and durable construction, stability, and optimal paddling efficiency, the DW-R boards excel in accelerating onto bumps, providing natural balance and maintaining control in shifting ocean energy.
